headline.main: Leading Interests of Colony Center in War Relief Plans; Women Devote Days to Sewing, Knitting and Making Bandages -- Blue Veils Are Awarded to Those Who Put in 20 Hours in Workroom Red Cross Work Absorbs Tuxedo

lead_paragraph: TUXEDO PARK. N.Y., Nov. 22 -- Members of this colony are busy these days, sewing:, knitting, making bandages and other supplies for the Red Cross and the British War Relief. They devote two days each week in the workroom at St. Mary's Episcopal Church here for the Red Cross and another day to relief of the British.
abstract: Tuxedo Pk, N Y, members work for Brit War Relief Soc discussed
